title: Garth, the hand of justice
body:
**Garth, the hand of justice**

**Passive: Virtuous Equilibrium**
Garth gains increased health through a balance of Armor and MR. 
1 armour and 1 MR grant 10 hp. 
( example 100 Armor and 200 MR would give 1000 HP. 200 Armor and 200MR would give 2000HP )

**Q: Hammer of Justice**
Garth deals damage to an enemy equal to 1/1.5/2/2.5% of his total health to the enemy. If Garth’s current health is less than his enemies’s heath he also slows them by 10/20/30/40% for 3 seconds.  

Damage Type: Magic Damage

**W: Verdict**
Cast on ally: Garth absolves an ally for 2/3/4/5 seconds, Attacks that bring an ally below 20% health will instead heal them for 10/20/30/40% of the damage dealt.

Cast on an enemy: Garth finds the enemy to be guilty. For 5 seconds, damage dealt to the enemy while above 50% health is increased by 1/2/3/4% (+1% per 1000 hp)
 
**E: Emancipate**
Garth removes all Crowd Control effects on an ally. For 5 seconds after use, garth gains the buff Selfless defender causing the next crowd control on his target to be redirected to himself.

**R: Need before Greed**
Garth causes the health of all players within 650 units to redistribute until everyone has the same %hp.

lol hate that name, garth. GARTH
I wanted the most annoying sounding name i could think of, GARTH
This Champion slighty remains me of Garen.
No, We have enough fucking tanks
We don't have enough Champions though I think LoL should have about 200 champions and 4 bans in ranked and Remove Fiora.

I say yes because I love Mage-Knight/Paladin archetypes. 

Passive: The scaling sounds alright. IMO. It's just that he's going to hit unkillable stage earlier than most other tanks in the game so this could be a lever to manipulate if you don't want his other abilities to be nerfed. 

Q: Hammer of Justice
I think you should take away the % or lower it down to 2.5% or something low. 
For a tank that gives too much damage.
Depends on the cooldown of this ability though. 
Also what type of damage is this?

W: Verdict
The Ally part sounds alright, makes bruisers turn into tanks pretty much. However the duration seems pretty high. 10 seconds is a long time, long enough to last a whole teamfight in the late game. Tone it down to 4 seconds at max rank i.e. 2/2.5/3/3.5/4 seconds. 

The enemy part sounds too strong. 40% is really strong even if it's just one character. From What I remember, DFG (Deathfire Grasp - an item that was deleted about 4-6 months ago) had increase 15% magic damage only and it was considered core on any AP Assassins, or AP Malphite/Alistars because it boosted damage by a ton. 
40% IMO is absurd, especially when it's from all sources.
I'd nerf it to like 15% but that's still too strong. IMO. 

You could make it max out at 20% as well as reduce the high duration be between 2 or 3 seconds.

E: I think it should just be a buff on the ally. So that the player doesn't need to reactivate it again to soak up the next CC. 

R: Sounds fun and interesting.

I r10 10/10, gr10 work m10.
____
EDIT: P.S. Have you thought up of a character lore/background for this guy? He sounds like a part of maybe the tribe/nation that Pantheon/Leona is in or a Demacian.

Thanks alot for the feedback, i decided to reduce the effect of the enemy verdict a lot and instead have it scale in accordance to his hp. Linking it to his passive, so that his strength can be tweaked by changing his passive. As for the lore, I am unsure if i want to go solari or damacian for the paladin theme. If we still had summoners i could have made him a summoner tired of the leagues indecisiveness in matter such as the battle of ionia. As a result decided to take justice into his own hands.

Yeah the ult is definitely too powerful because it's %HP essentially making any tank on the team kind-of useless. Maybe just a sheild equal to 50% of the enemies total HP could be more balanced. You could even add defensive buffs while the shield is active. Also Bulwark is already one of Galio's abilities, so maybe change the name to "Virtuous Equilibrium" or some shit.

Pretty solid idea though.

10s for Verdict on an ally may be a little long, but these ideas are pretty cool. It's coming hard to find a unique idea for champion abilities with how many there are, but the ultimate sounds pretty cool. Maybe also have a focus, so you can target an ally and boost them an extra 20% of the team's HP, for when your tank is going in or your carry is under attack.

Some people may not like the idea of "borrowing" HP though haha.

Yeah, i originally thought 10 seconds would be nice because for allies it only affects one attack. Either a big cd or you could waste it on an auto. For the enemy one, i could reduce it to 5 seconds, it doesn't seem very balanced at 10 secs now that you mention it. The ult is really a hit or miss, you don't want to use it when your team has higher hp, because that helps your enemies. Its best used to reverse a team fight.
